metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18508 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Network Security Services (NSS) before 3.36.7 and before 3.41.1, amalformed signature can cause a crash due to a null dereference, resultingin a Denial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
libnss3-1d - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
libnss3-nssdb - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
libnss3-tools - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.14.04.5').
